content.en: Multisensor data fusion: Algorithms play a crucial role in the field of multisensor data fusion, where data from multiple sources are combined to provide more reliable and accurate information. These algorithms are used in various applications, including Department of Defense areas and non-DoD applications. They unify detection, correlation, tracking, and classification into a single probabilistic procedure, optimize distributed multiple-sensor detection systems, and reduce data traffic in wireless sensor networks. Overall, algorithms enable the fusion of sensor data and improve the performance of tracking and prediction systems.
content.da: Multisensor datafusion: Algoritmer spiller en afgørende rolle inden for multisensor datafusion, hvor data fra flere kilder kombineres for at give mere pålidelig og nøjagtig information. Disse algoritmer anvendes i forskellige applikationer, herunder områder inden for Forsvarsministeriet og ikke-Forsvarsministeriets applikationer. De forener detektion, korrelation, sporing og klassifikation i en enkelt probabilistisk procedure, optimerer distribuerede multisensor detektionssystemer og reducerer datatrafikken i trådløse sensornetværk. Samlet set muliggør algoritmer fusion af sensordata og forbedrer ydeevnen af sporings- og forudsigelsessystemer.
